tuv.seg: Civil partnership and inheritance
Páirtnéireacht shibhialta agus oidhreachtúlacht
Your civil status affects your rights to inherit from your spouse/partner
Téann do stádas sibhialta i bhfeidhm ar do chearta oidhreachtúlachta ó do chéile/pháirtnéir
Civil partners have the same legal right to inherit as spouses and the same rights on intestacy
Tá an ceart dlíthiúil céanna ag páirtnéireachtaí sibhialta teacht in oidhreacht agus atá ag céilí agus na cearta céanna ar dhíthiomnacht
A will is automatically revoked when you register a civil partnership unless it was made in contemplation of that registration
Cúlghairtear uacht uaidh féin nuair a chláraíonn tú páirtnéireacht shibhialta mura ndearnadh é i rinnfheitheamh ar an gclárú sin
A bequest in a will to a person who is a witness to the will or to that person’s civil partner is void
Tá tiomnacht in uacht do dhuine ar fianaise é don uacht nó do pháirtnéir shibhialta an duine sin curtha ar neamhní
If you are not in a civil partnership, you may only inherit from your partner if you are left a bequest in a valid will
Mura bhfuil tú i bpáirtnéireacht shibhialta, féadfaidh tú teacht in oidhreacht ó do pháirtnéir má fhágtar tiomnacht agat in uacht bhailí amháin
However, a civil partner is entitled to what is called a "legal right share" of their deceased civil partner's estate even if:
Tá páirtnéir shibhialta i dteideal ar a dtugtar ‘cuid cheart dhlíthiúil’ d’eastát a bpáirtnéir shibhialta nach maireann, áfach, fiú:
• there is no will
• Mura bhfuil aon uacht
• the will is invalid
• Má tá an uacht neamhbhailí
• there is a valid will, but it leaves little or nothing to the surviving civil partner
• Má tá uacht bhailí ann, ach nch bhfágann sí ach beagán nó rud ar bith don pháirtnéir sibhialta marthanaigh
The civil status of the deceased person may also indirectly affect the inheritance rights of his/her children
D’fhéadfaí go dtiocfadh stádas sibhialta an duine nach maireann ar chearta oidhreachtúlachta a leanaí go neamhdhíreach chomh maith
Civil Partner's inheritance rights
Cearta oidhreachtúlachta an pháirtnéir sibhialta
The amount of the surviving civil partner's legal right share depends on two factors:
Braitheann méid an chuid cheart dhlíthiúil an pháirtnéir sibhialta marthanaigh ar dhá fhachtóir:
• whether or not there is a valid will
• Má tá uacht bhailí ann nó mura bhfuil
• whether or not the deceased civil partner has any children
• Má tá leanaí ag an bpáirtnéir sibhialta nach maireann nó mura bhfuil
You are entitled to the whole estate if:
Tá tú i dteideal an éastáit iomláin:
• there is no will or the will is invalid, and
• Mura bhfuil aon uacht ann nó tá an uacht neamhbhailí, agus
• the deceased civil partner has no children or grandchildren
• Mura bhfuil aon leanaí nó garleanaí ag an bpáirtnéir sibhialta nach maireann
You are entitled to two-thirds of the estate if:
Tá tú i dteideal dhá thrian den eastát:
• there is no valid will, and
• Mura bhfuil aon uacht bhailí ann, agus
• the deceased civil partner has children or grandchildren
• Má tá leanaí nó garleanaí ag an bpáirtnéir sibhialta nach maireann
You are entitled to one-half of the estate if:
Tá tú i dteideal aon leath den eastát:
• there is a valid will, and
• Má tá uacht bhailí ann agus
• the deceased civil partner has no children or grandchildren
• Mura bhfuil aon leanaí nó garleanaí ag an bpáirtnéir sibhialta nach maireann
You are entitled to one-third of the estate if:
Tá tú i dteideal aon trian den eastát:
• there is a valid will, and
• Má tá uacht bhailí ann agus
• the deceased civil partner has children or grandchildren
• Má tá leanaí nó garleanaí ag an bpáirtnéir sibhialta nach maireann
If you are the surviving civil partner, you must be informed of this right and should apply for your legal right share as soon as possible
Más tú an páirtnéir sibhialta marthanaigh, caithfear tú a chur ar an eolas faoin gceart seo agus ba cheart duit cur isteach ar do chuid cheart dhlíthiúil a luaithe agus is féidir
You may require that the shared home be given to you in satisfaction of your legal right share, even if the home was left to another person under the will
D’fhéadfaí go dteastódh uait an comhtheach a bheith tugtha duit mar shásamh ar do chuid cheart dhlíthiúil, fiú má fágadh an teach ag duine eile faoin uacht
If the shared home is worth more than the legal right share, you will normally have to pay the difference into the deceased's estate
Más tá fiúchas an tí níos mó ná an chuid cheart dhlíthiúil, beidh ort an difríocht a íoc isteach in eastát an duine nach maireann go hiondúil
However, in cases of hardship, you may apply to the court to have the dwelling house given to you either without paying the difference or by paying such sum as the court thinks reasonable
I gcásanna cruatain, áfach, féadfaidh tú cur isteach chuig an gcúirt go dtabharfaí an teach cónaithe duitse gan an difríocht a íoc nó suim a íoc atá réasúnta, mar a shíleann an chúirt
Children have a right to inherit from their biological parents
Tá ceart ag leanaí teacht in oidhreacht óna dtuismitheoirí fola
As the surviving civil partner's children are not the biological children of the deceased, they do not have a right to inherit from the deceased civil partner
Mar nach iad leanaí an pháirtnéir sibhialta marthanaigh leanaí fola an duine nach maireann, níl aon cheart acu teacht in oidhreacht ón bpáirtnéir sibhialta nach maireann
Children's inheritance rights may be affected by their deceased parent's civil status
D’fhéadfaí go gcuirfeadh stádas sibhialta an tuismitheora nach maireann isteach ar chearta oidhreachtúla leanaí
The children (minor and adult) are entitled to the entire estate divided equally between them if:
Tá na leanaí (mionaoiseach agus aosach) i dteideal an eastáit iomlán a bheith roinnte go comhionann eatarthu:
• there is no will or the will is invalid, and
• Mura bhfuil aon uacht ann nó tá an uacht neamhbhailí, agus
• the deceased parent is not in a civil partnership or his/her civil partner is already dead
• Mura bhfuil tuismitheoir nach maireann i bpáirtnéireacht shibhialta nó tá a p(h)áirtnéir sibhialta básaithe cheana
But the children are only entitled to one-third of the estate divided equally between them if:
Níl na leanaí i dteideal aon trian den eastát roinnte go comhionann eatarthu ach amháin:
• there is no valid will or the will is invalid, and
• Mura bhfuil aon uacht ann nó tá an uacht neamhbhailí, agus
• the deceased parent is in a civil partnership and is survived by his/her civil partner
• Má tá an tusimitheoir nach maireann i bpáirtnéireacht shibhialta agus tá sé ar marthain i ndiaidh a p(h)áirtnéir shibhialta
Children have no absolute right to inherit their parent's estate if the deceased parent has made a valid will
Níl aon dhearbhcheart ag leanaí teacht in oidhreacht ar eastát a dtuismitheora má tá uacht bhailí déanta ag an tuismitheoir nach maireann
However, if a child considers that he/she has not been adequately provided for, he/she may make an application to court
Má cheapann an leanbh nach bhfuil soláthar imleor déanta dó/di, áfach, féadfaidh sé/sí iarratas a chur isteach chuig an gcúirt
The child need not be a minor or be dependent in order to use this procedure
Ní gá don leanbh a bheith ina mhionaoiseach nó ina chleithiúnach chun úsáid a bhaint as an nós imeachta seo
The court has to decide if the parent has "failed in his moral duty to make proper provision for the child in accordance with his means"
Caithfidh an chúirt a chinneadh má “theip ar an tuismitheoir soláthar ceart a dhéanamh don leanbh de réir a chuid acmhainní”
Each case is decided on its merits and the court looks at the situation from the point of view of a "prudent and just" parent
Cinntear gach cás ar a thuillteanais agus féachann an chúirt ar an gcás ó thaobh “tuismitheoir stuama agus ceart”

Should the court order that some provision be made for a child or children from the estate of the deceased, such an order can reduce the entitlement of the surviving civil partner to a legal right share

Má dhéanann an chúirt ordú go gcaithfear soláthar éigin a dhéanamh do leanbh nó leanaí ó eastát an duine nach maireann, is féidir lena leithéid d’ordú teidlíocht an pháirtnéir shibhialta ar marthain a laghdú chuig cuid cheart dhlíthiúil
Anyone considering challenging a will on these grounds should get legal opinion before applying to the court
Ba cheart d’aon duine atá ag meas dushlán a thabhairt d’uacht ar na forais seo tuairim dhlíthiúil a fháil roimh chur isteach chuig an gcúirt
Marital status and inheritance rights
Stádas pósta agus cearta oidhreachtúla
You can find information on how marriage affects inheritance in our document on marital status and inheritance
Is féidir leat eolas a fháil ar an gcaoi a théann pósadh i bhfeidhm ar chearta oidhreachtúla inár gcáipéis ar stádas pósta agus oidhreachtúlacht
